musicsaur

The simplest music synchronization for multi-room audio.

Download


Click here to just downlad the version you need and get started!


Download source


I started writing musicsaur in Python, but have also ported it to Golang. There are different ways to get started with musicsaur depending on what you want to do:

Do you want download, install Python libraries, and run?

Then follow these instructions to get going with the Python version.

Do you want download, install Go libraries, and run?

Then follow these instructions to get going with the Go version.
